UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~\n本节点会将文本A和文本B结合后写入指定的TXT文件:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes!
This node combines Text A and Text B into a specified .txt file. If no path is provided, it saves to the 'zml_w/txt/Text input' folder within the plugin.
If a folder path is given, it writes to '文本输入.txt' inside that folder (creating it if necessary).
You can also specify a full path to a .txt file. Only .txt format is supported.
Enjoy!
UI_TEXT.你好，很高兴你使用ZML节点，到目前为止，你通过此节点总共转格式了{total_:
Hello, glad you are using ZML Nodes! You have converted images {total_count} times with this node.
If you don't want a title in the converted HTML, you can select 'Image-Only Output'.
The title is limited to 30 characters.
The 'Additional Image' is only active when 'Image-Only Output' is disabled. It appears to the left of the title, and its resolution is adjusted automatically based on its aspect ratio.
This node also supports creating GIFs from image batches. You can use a 'GIF File Path' node to load a GIF and input it here to convert it to HTML.
Have a great day!
UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~\n你可以在预设宽高框里输入你想要的分辨率，然后用英文:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes!
You can enter desired resolutions in the preset boxes, separated by commas ','. When the index is '0' or greater than the total number of presets, it will output a random value. Otherwise, it outputs the value at the specified index.
When 'Correlated Random' is enabled, width and height use the same random index (e.g., '832x1216' or '1216x832'). When disabled, they are randomized independently (e.g., you might get '832x832' or '1216x1216').
That's it! Enjoy using ZML Nodes!
